function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Diagnosis of covid-19 using ct image features","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mobile application for covid-19 symptom diagnosis","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on web scraping for covid-19 information","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prescriptive view may not effectively optimize resources for disease mitigation in the built
